plugins.name: kubevirt
plugins.description: Core KubeVirt workflows for VM lifecycle debugging and component analysis

commands.name: lint
commands.description: Lint a path and generate a plan to fix issues with separate commits per linter

commands.name: review-ci
commands.description: Review CI failures for a given PR and provide analysis with remediation suggestions

commands.name: review
commands.description: Review local branch changes using KubeVirt project best practices

commands.name: vep-groom
commands.description: Review a VEP proposal against template requirements and process guidelines

commands.name: vep-list
commands.description: List open KubeVirt Enhancement Proposals (VEPs) with status and filtering

commands.name: vep-summary
commands.description: Get a TL;DR summary of a specific VEP and its current state

plugins.name: utils
plugins.description: A generic utilities plugin serving as a catch-all for various helper commands
